That Box is cool copper.  The "Raudive Box" good name!
   
  William

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           Making the sound chamber out of copper as suggested, so thought I would call it the Raudive Box. It'll have the inner dividers, or channels. 
 
 Frank-S
